note:
Classical liberal. Skeptic. South African. Columnist for The Daily Friend, a publication of the Institute of Race Relations.

I write about many things, including politics, economics, conservation, science, energy, business, technology, food, and health.

Other interests include progressive rock, woodworking, history, mathematics and my wife, family and rescue animals.

Dislikes are bigotry, religion, quackery, cronyism, socialism, conservatism, and fascism both left & (alt-)right.
